sn55.41:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.41:1.4: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.41:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ariyasavako ariyakantehi silehi samannagato hoti akhandehi …pe… samadhisamvattanikehi.
sn55.41:3.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro punnabhisanda, kusalabhisanda, sukhassahara.
sn55.41:4.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi punnabhisandehi kusalabhisandehi samannagatassa ariyasavakassa na sukaram punnassa pamanam ganetum:
sn55.41:4.3: Atha kho asankhyeyyo appameyyo mahapunnakkhandhotveva sankhyam gacchati.
sn55.41:5.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, mahasamudde na sukaram udakassa pamanam ganetum:
sn55.41:5.2: ‘ettakani udakalhakani’ti va ‘ettakani udakalhakasatani’ti va ‘ettakani udakalhakasahassani’ti va ‘ettakani udakalhakasatasahassani’ti vati.
sn55.41:5.3: Atha kho asankhyeyyo appameyyo mahaudakakkhandhotveva sankhyam gacchati.
sn55.41:5.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, imehi catuhi punnabhisandehi kusalabhisandehi samannagatassa ariyasavakassa na sukaram punnassa pamanam ganetum:
sn55.41:5.6: Atha kho asankhyeyyo appameyyo mahapunnakkhandhotveva sankhyam gacchati”ti.
sn55.41:6.2: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
